Posture reminder

Open source posture reminder for Android

Dowload App→ (opens new window) See the code → (opens new window)

Multiple Reminders

Create reminders for differents ocations, you can also choose a sound an a vibration pattern.

Level up & Statistics

Gain experience and climb to get the highest level fixing your posture, you can see in the graphs how well you are doing.

Themes

Pick between Light and Dark theme or your system default one.
